experience.title: Founder & Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
experience.description: Cyber Security And Network Trainer, have provided 400+ Technical hands-on training to various clients & institutions covering over 40,000 participants from across the globe.● Perform security assessments such as VA/PT using tools like Nmap, Nessus, Accunetix, Burp suite , Metasploit and many more, Web Application, Source Code Review & configuration for various clients● Regular analysis of security of various Client network and IT infrastructure and suggest remediation plan : Advisory● Patch management and Back up activity Monitoring : Patch Management● Working on vulnerability Management Life-cycle : Reporting● Reviewing the Configurations of the Network: Incident Response● Designed content of Cyber Security E learning for many companies including one of Big4● Designed content of CCNA and CCNP E Learning for multiple clients.

recommendations: Rasha K. “I had the pleasure of hosting Gaurav Sharma for live webinars at Simplilearn, covering the IIIT B Advanced Executive Program in Cybersecurity and the IIT Kanpur PCP Cybersecurity - Red Team. What really makes Gaurav shine is his incredible teaching style. He’s not just knowledgeable—he’s a fantastic coach and an engaging trainer. His intelligence, calm demeanor, and confidence create an atmosphere where learning feels easy and enjoyable. Plus, his humor and relatability turn complex topics into fun, memorable sessions. As an audience member, I found his approach both refreshing and enlightening. Gaurav’s sessions not only provided invaluable insights but also significantly contributed to our revenue growth. His engaging style and expert content helped attract a larger audience and boosted our success. I’d be thrilled to work with him again and highly recommend him for anyone seeking top-notch cybersecurity education and training.”
Venkatesh Vanjre “I and Gaurav worked with same organisarion. He is an amazing professional, who brings all of the skills and expertise in Cyber Security. We had a good time 👍”
